channel.title: How To change xp rate - sorry if its a n00b question
channel.description: Ya umm i searched [code]public boolean addSkillXP[/code] but i don't know what to change......i've seen a lot of stuff but don't know which one it is...help anybody? thanks =D

case (ID of the dummy):

And, like I said, for NPCs search FightType == 1 and read.

item.title: How To change xp rate - sorry if its a n00b question
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

thanks guys…i haven’t tried yet but for doing the dummie, that was easy. I’m not sure if u understand…
I want it so if i hit a 1 on an npc i get like 15k xp…
Right now training on a door …my people say its not fun… so i want them to train str on npcs and its too slow right now
its regular 1 hit = 4xp
ex: 7 = 28 xp
wat i want ex: 7 = 105000 xp

is addskillxp(int, int) …searching…

Read full topic

item.title: How To change xp rate - sorry if its a n00b question
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:4, topic:284186”]addSkillXP(int, int)
Don’t forget that, cook.

For fighting xp, search FightType == 1[/quote]

Yeh it’s probably that, I don’t actually code servers so I’m not sure of the exact syntax.

Read full topic

item.title: How To change xp rate - sorry if its a n00b question
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

Search addSkillXP( and stop when you find the one for whatever skill you want.

For example, the XP rate at the dummies may be 100 per hit, so it would say addSkillXP(100); in the dummy object case.

Read full topic
